2021-12-01.name: Given: Uragawa no Sonzai
2021-12-01.desc:
* Based on a BL music manga series by Kizu Natsuki.

Note: Bundled with the limited edition of the 7th manga volume.

2021-12-01.name: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Stone Ocean
2021-12-01.desc:
* Based on the sixth story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure manga series by Araki Hirohiko. The arc spanned 17 volumes total, consisting of volumes 64 through 80 of the overall manga, and was serialized in Weekly Shounen Jump from 1999 to 2003.

Florida, U.S.A, 2011. After an accident while on a drive with her sweetheart, Jolyne Cujoh falls into a trap and is sentenced to fifteen years. She is sent to the state-run maximum-security correctional facility Green Dolphin Street Prison—AKA "the Aquarium." On the verge of despair, she receives a pendant from her father that causes a mysterious power to awaken inside of her.

"There are things in this world that are more terrifying than death, and what's happening in this prison is definitely one of them."

A message from a mysterious boy who appears before Jolyne, inexplicable events that occur one after another, the horrifying truth told to her by her father when he comes to visit, and the name DIO... Will Jolyne ultimately be set free from this stone ocean they call a prison? The final battle to end century-long fateful confrontations between the Joestar family and DIO begins!!

Source: Official website

2021-12-03.name: Aria the Benedizione
2021-12-03.desc:
* Based on the fantasy slice of life manga series Aria by Amano Kozue.

A new animated film that revolves around the members of Himeya.

2021-12-03.name: Dawang Raoming
2021-12-03.desc:
The silent life shattered in the age of the resurgent spirit, as if thunder ran through the long sky, lightning shot straight to the heart of heaven, and rain fell in rustling. Whatever goes against us will eventually die, that is the law.
High school student Lu Shu changes his life in a car accident. When the era of aura recovery comes, he wants to be the leader of this era.
What goes around comes around, and the winner is the king.
This is the story of Lu Shu who relies on poisonous chicken soup to become a great demon king

source: baike.baidu.com/DeepL.com

2021-12-05.name: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Yuukaku Hen
2021-12-05.desc:
* Based on an action fantasy shounen manga by Gotouge Koyoharu.

Tanjirou and his comrades embark on a new mission within the Yoshiwara Entertainment District to face the demon Daki.

Source: Official twitter

2021-12-06.name: Kanashiki Debu Neko-chan
2021-12-06.desc:
The story centers on a cat named Maru, adopted by a girl named Anna from a shelter in Matsuyama city. Loved and well fed by the family, Maru gets rounder and fatter every day, spending most of his day sitting by the window and looking at the garden outside. When the family gets a new cat named Cerisier and begins doting on it, Maru gets jealous. In a fight with Cerisier, Maru is hurt by the family's words to him, and follows the advice of another cat to leave and see the world.

Source: ANN

2021-12-08.name: Shushan Qi Xian Lu
2021-12-08.desc:
During the Tang Dynasty, the border is in turmoil. Li Haobai, a young man from Shu, has his heart set on the journey to join the army at Hangu Pass with his young partner Hu Jian in order to realize his ambition; in the chaotic world, demons emerge. In the city of Chengdu, the old Taoist Free Spirit goes around subduing demons and eliminating them; while far away in Chang'an, the unsuspecting old Taoist Xun Guosi deceives the Emperor into cultivating immortality and uses his minions to capture "dragon beasts" indiscriminately " to cultivate an immortal elixir. Li Haobai, by chance, fuses with the "Lixi pearl" inside the dragon beast and becomes the target of all the people. Not only does Xun Guo Shi's men want to capture Li Haobai, but also people from all walks of life in the Jianghu River want to get the Lixi pearl to cultivate immortality. Li Haobai is rescued by a man who is passing by to remove the demons. He is warned that if he does not take out the Lixi pearl and return it to the Dragon Veins, Li Haobai will die within 30 days and the world will suffer a catastrophe due to the turbulence of the Dragon Veins. On their way to join the army at Hangu Pass, they meet a wandering girl from the West, Ahimu. During the journey, the four escape from the pursuit of Xun Guo Shi's men several times, and during the journey, Li Xiao Bai slowly merges with Li Hao Bai, who inadvertently transforms into a "black dragon". During the journey, a white dragon, symbolizing "yang", suddenly appears and pesters Li Haobai all the way. The mysterious white dragon leads the boy to leave Li Haobai and track down the white dragon to discover its secret. When the Lixi pearl is discovered, the news spreads around the world and Li Haobai, who is carrying the Lixi pearl, is hunted by strange people in the jungle.

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2021-12-16.name: Aggressive Retsuko (2021)
2021-12-16.desc:
Frustrated with her thankless office job, Retsuko the Red Panda copes with her daily struggles by belting out death metal karaoke after work. After becoming an underground idol to pay off her debts, Retsuko decides to quit OTMGirls and enjoy living a happy, normal life... but just as the company she works for is facing big changes, her relationship with Haida finally begins to move.

Source: netflix

2021-12-17.name: Feng Qi Luoyang: Shen Ji Shaonian
2021-12-17.desc:
In the first year of the first year of the reign of the Emperor, the divine capital of Luoyang. The Empress Wu, who is on the verge of becoming emperor, issues an imperial edict to the whole world, announcing the reopening of the Imperial Examination. As soon as the news breaks, the whole country is flooded with talented people, but then a reckless fox demon emerges from Luoyang, who has a penchant for sneaking up on young candidates. As the students disappear, rumours abound and the people are on tenterhooks. Pei Kun, a descendant of Lian Shan Tang, who is proficient in the art of "huan trickery", comes to Luoyang at this time and is involved in a huge "demon-hunting" operation by mistake. Pei Kun's high-profile appearance attracts the attention of many forces in Luoyang City. Pei Kun is determined to fulfil his master's last wish to find out the truth about the year, so he joins forces with the Feilin Guards and the Temple of Punishment, and is also offered an olive branch by Gong Zi Chu, the Empress Wu's chief intelligence officer. It turns out that Gong Zi Chu has long monitored the imminent reappearance of the long-dormant ancient organization Chun Qiu Dao, and that the fox demon is just a blindfold ......

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2021-12-18.name: Dou Hun Wei: Xuan Yue Qi Yuan V

2021-12-21.name: Zi Chuan
2021-12-21.desc:
The story of the mythical continent of Xichuan, the legend of generations of bloodshed: within the human empire, in a distant and mysterious eastern family, the three Zichuan heroes rise up! The older brother, Tilin, is calm and resourceful, the second brother, Sterling, is a loyal and patriotic soldier, and the third brother, Zichuan Xiu, is known as a scoundrel, but he is also wise and brave. As the Zichuan family suffers from internal and external problems, the three Zichuan heroes show their skills: Zichuan Xiu fights off the fierce demons at a critical moment and breaks into the tiger's den alone to hunt down the rebel Lei Hong; Sterling puts the family first and is ruthless yet fond of parting with his lover ..... The human race, the demon race, the beast race and the Far Eastern races are all tangled up on this continent. In the mingling of blood and fire, and the clash of swords and knives, a vast and epic story - Zigawa - is formed. The animation depicts a unique and wonderful world, revealing a group of characters with different personalities, one by one, in a legendary tragic song that is both magnificent and poignant.

source: baike.baidu/DeepL.com

2021-12-23.name: Chikajou no Mamono
2021-12-23.desc:
A demon has emerged deep beneath Tokyo. The governor of Tokyo and his escort unit go to inspect but are trapped underground. Surrounded by darkness with nowhere to go, people lose their reason and become consumed by the demon.

Source: Official Stream

2021-12-24.name: Gekijouban Jujutsu Kaisen 0
2021-12-24.desc:
* Based on a dark fantasy shounen manga by Akutami Gege.

Okkotsu Yuuta is a nervous high school student who is suffering from a serious problem—his childhood friend Rika has turned into a Curse and won't leave him alone. Since Rika is no ordinary Curse, his plight is noticed by Gojou Satoru, a teacher at Jujutsu High, a school where fledgling exorcists learn how to combat Curses. Gojou convinces Yuuta to enroll, but can he learn enough in time to confront the Curse that haunts him?

Source: Viz

2021-12-25.name: Huan You Lieren
2021-12-25.desc:
In 2075, the Earth's resources are being depleted and a highly technological and competitive society is pushing the human mind to the brink of collapse. The young people of the 20th century have been dubbed the "ruined generation" and are indulging in virtual reality games on a massive scale. In order to rescue the increasingly disillusioned human race, the Phantom Hunters were created.

source: bgm.tv/deepl.com

2021-12-27.name: Xue Ying Lingzhu Di San Ji

2021-12-28.name: The Missing 8
2021-12-28.desc:
A devastated world ── Androids and robots live there. "Poppy" is an android that looks like a human. Android "Punkun" who is not interested in human. One night, a star fell in front of them looking up at the sky...

Source: Official YouTube channel

2021-12-28.name: Wan Yu Feng Shen
2021-12-28.desc:
Yun Fei Xue's father, Yun Tiangang, and his brother, Yun Fei Shan, were assassinated eight years ago during a mission to escort a dragon vein. Yun Fei Xue, who had just suppressed the phantom in his body, received the sad news of his father and brother's tragic death and knew that if he wanted to avenge his family and revive the Yun family, he had to hide his strength. But behind the scenes, he gathers a group called "Shadow" to investigate the mystery. The seemingly carefree life in Hidden Dragon City is in fact full of crises. After investigation, Yun Fei Xue finds the clues of the past, and follows the trail to the organization behind the scene - the Golden Dragon Guard! The Golden Dragon Guard is no longer a trusted bodyguard for the emperor, but an evil organisation controlled by the former eunuch Li Shengyi, with the crown prince as a puppet, whose power is spread across the temple and the rivers and lakes. For both public and private reasons, Yun Fei Xue wants to eradicate this scourge, but the Golden Dragon Guard is too powerful and meticulous, and at present Yun Fei Xue is not strong enough to confront it, so he can only sabotage its plans in secret. But the Golden Dragon Guard has become more and more arrogant. First, it struck out in secret, exterminating the Eastern Yi clan and robbing them of the Xuan Yuan Pills, which increase their strength. And then Xiao Wuyi, a pawn of the Golden Dragon Guard, also secretly designs to divide Yun Feixue and his partner Wen Qingqing, using Wen Qingqing against Yun Feixue. On the other hand, the Golden Dragon Guard designed to trap the Princess of Ice City - Xue Siyu, who had been helping Yun Feixue, and Xue Siyu was forcibly recalled by her family. The Golden Dragon Guard is also suspicious of Yun Feixue and points all fingers at him, and he understands that he cannot sit on his hands any longer. Through the "Shadow", Yun Fei Xue learns that the Golden Dragon Guard will soon have a mysterious deal with the Ye family on the Thousand Illusions Island, where Yun Fei Xue helps the Ye family win the Jade Vein and tide over the difficult times, thus forming a brotherhood with the young master of the Ye family, Ye Qingyu. Through Ye Qingyu, Yun Feixue learns that the Golden Dragon Guards have been secretly searching for precious treasures to help the Holy Lord - a mysterious martial arts manual that Li Shengyi used to train, which was actually left behind by Yun Feixue's long-lost mother. Meanwhile Yun Feixue pries that her brother Yun Feishan seems to be alive. It seems that the mystery surrounding him is becoming more and more bizarre. Only then does Yun Fei Xue discover that eight years ago, a conspiracy against him had already begun quietly.

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2021-12-29.name: Tunshi Xingkong Zhuangzhi Lingyun
2021-12-29.desc:
One day, an unexplained RR virus appears on Earth, plunging the world into disaster. The infected animals mutate into horrific monsters and invade the world, while the human race faces destruction. This period of human suffering is known as the "Great Nirvana". Under the extreme conditions of survival, the physical abilities of mankind were gradually developed and the culture of martial arts was promoted. The best of them were called "martial artists". At the age of 18, Luo Feng also dreamed of becoming one of them. He is about to take his entrance exams and is facing a crossroads decision in his life when a monster attack affects his life. Under the threat of a powerful beast, the city's residents are in danger and the military is helpless to do anything about it. Only a martial artist steps forward to defend the city. Infected by the martial artist's strength, Luo Feng secretly made up his mind to become a martial artist to protect his loved ones. This was the start of everything, the beginning of Luo Feng's journey as a martial artist, and the beginning of his legendary life. The first thing he had to face was the invisible influence of his external environment. His parents were unable to give him much help, and he had to rely on his own efforts. Eventually, under constant hardship, Luo Feng continued to explore his potential and was able to improve his abilities and gain recognition of his self-worth. Not only did Luo Feng take on the burden of providing for his family, he also joined forces with other righteous martial artists to fight vicious monsters in order to protect the human homeland and for the better survival and development of humanity. Will Luo Feng and the other martial artists be able to repel the monsters and successfully protect the human world in the face of the end of time?

source: v.qq.com/DeepL.com

2021-12-31.name: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo: Rail Zeppelin Grace Note - Tokubetsu Hen
2021-12-31.desc:
A letter is delivered to Lord El-Melloi II informing him of a Clock Tower reunion. One morning, as the reunion's date draws near, Lord El-Melloi II takes a look in the mirror and reels in shock. He is suddenly a full decade younger! Lord El-Melloi II has become Waver Velvet, his former self! Believing himself to be in the grip of a powerful, magically induced delusion, Lord El-Melloi II immediately begins investigating how this could have happened. On the day of the reunion, he makes his way to the gathering of his contemporaries, planning to confront whoever transformed his body and hoping to reveal their intentions. However, when Aozaki Touko arrives, things take a sudden turn...

Source: Crunchyroll

2021-12-31.name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Tsuioku Hen
2021-12-31.desc:
* Based on the light novel's eighth volume by the same name written by Satou Tsutomu and illustrated by Ishida Kana.

Looking at Miyuki and Tatsuya now, it might be hard to imagine them as anything other than loving siblings. But it wasn't always this way...

Three years ago, Miyuki was always uncomfortable around her older brother. The rest of their family treated him no better than a lowly servant, even though he was the perfect Guardian, watching over Miyuki while she lived a normal middle school life. But what really bothered her was that he never showed any emotions or thoughts of his own.

However, when danger comes calling during a fateful trip to Okinawa, their relationship as brother and sister will change forever...

Source: Yen Press

2021-12-31.name: Sorairo Utility
2021-12-31.desc:
Minami is a high school girl and beginner at golf. Her two friends Haruka and Ayaka introduce her to the sport and they enjoy playing and learning together.

Source: ANN
